addNewPeopleNotice.title: Add new people
addNewPeopleNotice.message: If you need to add people, you can invite them to join the community or you can <orgOverviewLink>contact your administrator</orgOverviewLink>.

project.description: Choose which groups of users can view and edit this project.
project.editGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to edit project information.
project.viewGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to search and view the project, if it is not shared to the public.
project.errorMessage: There was an error updating the collaborators of your project.

content.description: Choose which groups of users can view and edit this content.
content.editGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to edit content information.
content.viewGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to search and view the content, if it is not shared to the public.
content.errorMessage: There was an error updating the collaborators of your content.

discussion.description: Choose which groups of users can view and edit this discussion.
discussion.editGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to edit discussion information.
discussion.viewGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to search and view the discussion, if it is not shared to the public.
discussion.errorMessage: There was an error updating the collaborators of your discussion.

site.description: Choose which groups of users can view and edit this site.
site.editGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to edit site information.
site.viewGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to search and view the site, if it is not shared to the public.
site.errorMessage: There was an error updating the collaborators of your site.

template.description: Choose which groups of users can view and edit this template.
template.editGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to edit template information.
template.viewGroupsDescription: The people in these groups will be able to search and view the template, if it is not shared to the public.
template.errorMessage: There was an error updating the collaborators of your template.

supportingTeamsDesc: These supporting teams were previously linked to your site. You can continue to use them to share content with collaborators.
supportingTeamsRemoveError: Error unlinking team. Contact an administrator.
